name: PARKOUR PACK AERIAL M
description: Weight: approx. 500g Measurements: 42 x 27 x 10cm (HxWxD) Volume: approx. 10 liters Colors: Black (No. 258), Dark Denim (No. 257), Olive (No. 256) Material: Outside 400 D x 280 D Diamond Shaped Nylon 400 D x 400 D Nylon Jacquard 600 D x 600 D Polyester heavy duty, tear-resistant, water-repellent Inside 210 D x 210 D Nylon - Backpack complete with cross belt - A 1.5 liter bottle fits in the inside compartment - Striking logo appliqués - Removable cross belt to hold things like bike helmets - Fleece lined mobile phone pocket - Comfortable back cushion, mesh in the middle aids active air circulation; shoulder belts made of breathable mesh - 2 zipper pullers make opening and closing easy - Elastic and adjustable chest strap in textile quality ensures a custom fit; incl. 2 pockets - Elastic and adjustable hip belt for an individual and custom fit 2 secret compartments inside for things like tools
